divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS STANDING IN THE PARKING LOT OF MY SHOP & MY FRIEND SAID FRED COME TAKE A LOOK AT THIS.I WALKED OUT SIDE & SAW A VERY BRIGHT ROUND OBJECT THAT HOVERING ABOUT 100 FEET ABOVE US. WE NOTICED THAT IT WAS TOTALLY QUIET; THERE WAS NO NOISE AT ALL. WE WATCHED THE OBJECT FOR AT LEAST 15 MINUTES.I WENT BACK INTO MY SHOP TO GET MY CAMERA &WHEN I CAME BACK OUTSIDE THE OBJECT WAS GONE. IT WAS A BEAUTIFUL DAY & THERE WAS NOT A CLOUD IN THE SKY. I HAVE NO CLUE WHAT IT WAS THAT WE SAW BUT EVERY TIME I THINK ABOUT IT I GET THE CHILLS. COULD YOU PLEASE SEND ME SOME PICTURES SO I MIGHT BE ABLE TO MAKE SOME SENSE OF THIS THANK YOU THIS
